1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that:The Prophet said: "Sins are expiated by well-performed ablution despite difficulties, increasing the number of steps one takes towards the mosque, (and waiting for the next prayer after prayer)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِسْبَاغِ الْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning performing ablution properly
